```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r data pipeline}
subject <- read_csv("subject.csv", 
                    col_names = c("rep", "size", "word", "score"))

subject %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = size, y = score)) + 
  geom_col(aes(color = rep)) + 
  facet_grid(word~rep) + 
  scale_color_hue()
```
